entities.description: The types of locations categorized in the survey from where respondents' data was collected.
A type of location at an Air, Bus, or Train Terminal.
A type of location at a Bank or Savings and Loan institution.
A type of location at a Bar or Nightclub.
A type of location at religious buildings such as a Church, Synagogue, Temple, or Mosque.
A type of location at a Commercial or Office Building.
A type of location at a Construction Site.
A type of location at a Convenience Store.
A type of location at a Department or Discount Store.
A type of location at a Drug Store, Doctor's Office, or Hospital.
A type of location at a Field or Woods.
A type of location at a Government or Public Building.
A type of location at a Grocery store or Supermarket.
A type of location at a Highway, Road, Alley, Street, or Sidewalk.
A type of location at a Hotel, Motel, or similar establishment.
A type of location at a Jail, Prison, Penitentiary, or Correctional Facility.
A type of location at a Lake, Waterway, or Beach.
A type of location at a Liquor Store.
A type of location at a Parking Lot or Garage.
A type of location at a Rental Storage Facility.
A type of location at a Residence or Home.
A type of location at a Restaurant.
A type of location at a School or College.
A type of location at a Service or Gas Station.
A type of location at a Specialty Store (e.g., TV, Fur, etc.).
A type of location categorized as 'Other' or 'Unknown'.

relationships.description: Specifies the type of location assessed in the survey.
